name: ChainWeaver Studio
description: Intuitive visual development environment for smart contracts and dApps.
longDescription: ChainWeaver Studio simplifies blockchain development with a drag-and-drop interface, pre-built templates, and seamless deployment to multiple networks. Currently in public beta.
activationDetails: Register for beta access. Keys distributed weekly.

name: CyberGuard Pro
longDescription: CyberGuard Pro offers multi-layered protection against advanced threats, including malware, ransomware, and phishing attacks. Features real-time monitoring, AI-driven threat detection, and automated incident response.
activationDetails: License key required. Purchase confirmation email contains details.

name: InsightAI Engine
description: Next-gen AI engine for predictive analytics and real-time decision making.
longDescription: InsightAI Engine leverages advanced machine learning models to provide actionable insights from complex datasets. Designed for scalability and ease of integration. Coming soon!
activationDetails: Join waitlist for early access notifications.

name: SecureLedger IoT
description: IoT device management platform with blockchain-backed security.
longDescription: SecureLedger IoT provides a robust platform for managing and securing IoT devices, leveraging blockchain for immutable logging and enhanced data integrity. Ideal for industrial and smart city applications.
activationDetails: Device registration required. Portal access provided upon subscription.

name: FactoryOS Suite
description: Comprehensive MES and SCADA solution for modern factories.
longDescription: FactoryOS Suite integrates Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) with SCADA capabilities for real-time monitoring, control, and optimization of industrial processes. Enhances efficiency and reduces downtime.
activationDetails: On-premise installation and licensing. Contact sales for a quote.
